data.event: Also in the settlement lies the historic old church of Agia Paraskevi (built in 1700) where the Greek rebels under Theodoros Kolokotronis attended the divine liturgy just before the crucial victorious battle in Kafkaria against the Turkish general Ibrahim Pasha of Egypt.

event.title: d’ Occidente, Atti del Convegno Internationale di Studi (Paestum, 23-25.2.2001), Paestum-Athens 2002

data.event: Greco (επιμ.), Gli Achei e l’ identità etnica degli Achei d’ Occidente, Atti del Convegno Internationale di Studi (Paestum, 23-25.2.2001), Paestum-Athens 2002, p.
